page.title: 07Winteringham's Indoor Riding
page.content: The proprietress of{Winteringham Farm gives the horses 20 minutes workout per day on the lunge rein in the indoor shed. They use a long whip to hit the ground so the horses know when to speed up and slow down.The ground of the indoor ring is covered with a thick layer of sawdust so it is not hard on the horse's feet.They also have sodium lamps in the shed so the horses are not dazzled when training. The proprietress makes her own horse jumps out of various materials.They have to start jumping over the small ones and then move to the higher poles. When they are riding the horses,they work for a whole hour. In trials or a competition the horses have to be ridden for extra long periods of time.
